text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct version 2021
    CodeDisplay
    448864006Malignant epithelial neoplasm of ureter (disorder)
    895354002Primary malignant neoplasm of left ureter (disorder)
    895356000Primary malignant neoplasm of bilateral ureters (disorder)
    126882009Neoplasm of ureter (disorder)
    1082291000119108Transitional cell carcinoma of left ureter (disorder)
    254928005Tumor of pelviureteric junction (disorder)
    300988009Transitional cell carcinoma of ureter (disorder)
    1082311000119107Transitional cell carcinoma of right ureter (disorder)
    92783001Carcinoma in situ of ureteric orifice of urinary bladder (disorder)
    92782006Carcinoma in situ of ureter (disorder)
    94121005Primary malignant neoplasm of ureter (disorder)
    94122003Primary malignant neoplasm of ureteric orifice of urinary bladder (disorder)
    126892001Neoplasm of ureteric orifice of urinary bladder (disorder)
    689851000119102Primary transitional cell carcinoma of ureteral orifice (disorder)
    363458004Malignant tumor of ureter (disorder)
    682041000119100Primary adenocarcinoma of ureteral orifice (disorder)
    188253000Malignant tumor of pelviureteric junction (disorder)
    895355001Primary malignant neoplasm of right ureter (disorder)
    689441000119102Primary squamous cell carcinoma of ureteral orifice (disorder)
    188245008Malignant tumor of ureteric orifice (disorder)
    369463005Malignant tumor involving ureter by direct extension from bladder (disorder)
  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-10-cm version 2022
    CodeDisplay
    C66.9Malignant neoplasm of unspecified ureter
    C66.2Malignant neoplasm of left ureter
    C66Malignant neoplasm of ureter
    C66.1Malignant neoplasm of right ureter

name: UreterCancerCombined
title: Ureter Cancer Combined
description: This valueset contains the diagnosis codes for ureter cancer and diseases that are clinically treated as ureter cancer. It contains both ICD-10 and SNOMED.
